comments.raw_text:
running the testcase triggers:

###!!! ASSERTION: SHEntry already contains viewer: '!aViewer || !mContentViewer', file docshell/shistory/src/nsSHEntry.cpp, line 241

and during shutdown:

###!!! ASSERTION: User did not call nsIContentViewer::Destroy: '!mPresShell && !mPresContext', file layout/base/nsDocumentViewer.cpp, line 588
